  • Method Details

    • isOkay

      public static boolean isOkay(@NotNull @NotNull Configuration configuration, IndexCheck.IndexCheckMode mode, Collection<String> projectNames) throws IOException
      Check index(es).
      Parameters:
      configuration - configuration based on which to perform the check
      mode - index check mode
      projectNames - collection of project names. If non-empty, only projects matching these paths will be checked. Otherwise, either the sole index or all project indexes will be checked, depending on whether projects are enabled in the configuration.
      Returns:
      true on success, false on failure
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkDir

      public static void checkDir(Path sourcePath, Path indexPath, IndexCheck.IndexCheckMode mode) throws IndexCheck.IndexVersionException, IndexCheck.IndexDocumentException, IOException
      Check index in given directory. It assumes that that all commits (if any) in the Lucene segment file were done with the same version.
      Parameters:
      sourcePath - path to source directory
      indexPath - directory with index to check
      mode - index check mode
      Throws:
      IOException - if the directory cannot be opened
      IndexCheck.IndexVersionException - if the version of the index does not match Lucene index version
      IndexCheck.IndexDocumentException - if there are duplicate documents in the index or not matching definitions

    • getIndexReader

      public static org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader getIndexReader(Path indexPath) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getDeletedUids

      public static Set<String> getDeletedUids(Path indexPath) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      indexPath - path to the index
      Returns:
      set of deleted uids in the index related to the project name
      Throws:
      IOException - if the index cannot be read

    • getLiveDocumentPaths

      @Nullable public static @Nullable List<String> getLiveDocumentPaths(Path indexPath) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      indexPath - path to index
      Returns:
      list of live document paths (some of them can be duplicate if the index is corrupted) or null if live documents cannot be retrieved.
      Throws:
      IOException - on I/O error
